Dodge the knife: You fail to dodge the knife and die in pain.`FAILED DODGE ENDING
Scream like a little girl: You scream so loudly that the knife gets deflected. The Great Cuboid is so angry that he explodes.`SCREAMING ENDING

Psychologically bully The Cuboid: The Great Cuboid gets sad and calls in the Cosmic Teacher, who kills you to death.`BULLY ENDING

Be pretend sorry: The Cuboid sees through you. He stomps you into a puddle.`PUDDLE ENDING
Be real sorry: The Cuboid feels better, and you become friends.`FRIEND ENDING

Yell some more again: The Cuboid gets so angry that he expands and expands and turns into a black hole and eats the universe.`ANGERY ENDING
Say sorry: NO U! U DUM! The Cuboid punches you.`OUCH ENDING
Eat him: You eat him. He tastes very good. Then you get indigestion and die.`CONSTIPATION ENDING

Lie down and cry: You get so sad that you commit suicide.`SEVERE DEPRESSION ENDING
Induce amnesia: You give yourself amnesia and forget how to breathe.`LOL UR DUMB ENDING

Eat another pizza: The Cuboid gets so sad that he keels over and dies.`PIZZA-INDUCED DEPRESSION ENDING
Apologize and give the Cuboid your other: Cuboid accepts the pizza and you become best friends.`BFF ENDING

Stick up your middle finger: The Cuboid tries to roar, but then he remembers that he doesn't have a mouth. He flails, and knocks you over and you impale yourself on your middle finger.`DEATH-BY-FINGER ENDING

Run back to The Headless Cuboid: The giants chase you, and discover The Headless Cuboid. They then take turns biting your head off.`ANGERED GIANTS ENDING
Throw a temper tantrum: The giants try to stomp you, but then they realize you have plot armour from being the protaganist of this game.`PLOT ARMOUR ENDING

Ascend to heaven: You ascend to heaven, but God denies you and you die of bubonic plague for no good reason at all.`FAILED HEAVEN ENDING

Attempt to detonate again: You detonated so hard that you broke the game, %(name)s. Very rude.`CmDmxoYTqbzfsJIsixGRueLEGpRsmrMzJoNCHdnDHPTVjqmaLcNAOpjssYxMimoijKBGK

Stomp: You stomp so hard that you trigger an earthquake. Then you get crushed by a rock.`EARTHQUAKE ENDING

Frick. You say it out loud. You repeat it, until The Great Cuboid gets bored and stomps you.`JAMMED GUN ENDING

0: You hit, and the aliens ship is penetrated. You hit the engine, and it explodes the Great Cuboid.`DESTROYED ALIENS ENDING
1: You miss your shot. The aliens notice, and blast you to shreds.`MISSED LASER ENDING

Fumble for any other weapons you might h: You fumble for weapons so hard you fall over and die.`WTF ENDING

Signal the aliens down: Apparently, waving in alien culture is an insult. Gun ports open and blast you to shreds.`MISCOMMUNICATION ENDING
Dig a hole: You dig a hole. You jump in the hole and the hole collapses and you asphyxiate in mud.`MUD ENDING

Faint for no reason: You faint. The Cuboid eats you.`UNCONSCIOUS ENDING

Fart a silent but deadly: Oops, too deadly. You fart out Chlorine Trifluoride and the Earth explodes in a giant fireball.`LETHAL FART ENDING

Keep playing dead: The Great Cuboid falls for your act, and eats you.`GET EATEN ENDING
Scream: The Cuboid is so surprised that he falls over. You make it to the ground and run.`PLAY DEAD ENDING

Chew on his finger: You break your jaw on his nails and die.`BROKEN JAW ENDING
commit die: you commit die. the die spreads and everyone commits die. the universe no longer exis-`DIE ENDI-

Projectile vomit: You vomit so hard that you fly out of his grasp and land in the ground. You somehow survive.`VOMIT ENDING

Cute puppy dog face ftw: The Great Cuboid thinks you are very cute. Cuboid takes you to his lair and you spend the rest of your life getting petted by a giant.`PET ENDING

Swallow the baby: The Cosmic Babysitter show up and kicks your butt so hard that it falls off.`BABY-EATER ENDING
Call on the power of Satan: You call on the power of Satan, and his power overruns you and consumes you. You turn into a ball of black magic.`BLACK MAGIC ENDING

Light it on fire: The world lights on fire and vaporizes into a ball of ash.`THE WORLD IS ON FIRE ENDING
Do nothing: A giant squirrel crawls over and claws you to pieces. You die in pain.`MUTANT SQUIRREL ENDING
Wait: The Square-Cube Law comes in to effect and the tree dies. You break the walls and escape.`TREE ESCAPEE ENDING
